com.adlibsoftware.client.Payload

  • Packages that use Payload 
    Package Description
    com.adlibsoftware.client
    The low-level WSDL interface classes used by JobManagementServiceClient
    com.adlibsoftware.integration
    The main integration package to use by API/SDK clients
